Metrion Biosciences 通过三项关键任命加强团队实力Clare Rutty 晋升为首席财务官，Sue Peffer 被任命为营销主管，Leanne Clarke 被任命为人力资源官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Metrion-Biosciences-strengthens-team-with- Three-key-appointments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Metrion-Biosciences-strengthens-team-with- Three-key-appointments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf3a0336-e2e6-45b4-8149-3d76ac80d601 Mon, 11 Mar 2024 09:05:00 -0400 Metrion Biosciences strengthens team with three key appointments
Ubiquigent 与 Astellas 子公司 Nanna Therapeutics 达成协议该协议利用 Ubiquigent 以 DUB 为重点的药物发现平台，支持针对 Nanna Therapeutics 选定的多种疾病靶点开发新型治疗候选药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Ubiquigent-enters-agreement-with-Astellas-subsidiary-Nanna-Therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Ubiquigent-enters-agreement-with-Astellas-subsidiary-Nanna-Therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4210be21-8742-4ead-9360-b9254f4496ee Mon, 11 Mar 2024 08:55:00 -0400 Ubiquigent enters agreement with Astellas subsidiary, Nanna Therapeutics

研究揭示嗅觉障碍对人身安全和情绪健康的影响最新研究表明，超过三分之一的自认患有嗅觉障碍的人在过去五年中至少经历过一次燃气安全恐慌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Study-reveals-the-impact-of-olfactory-disorders-on-personal-safety-and-emotional-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Study-reveals-the-impact-of-olfactory-disorders-on-personal-safety-and-emotional-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9572e210-2069-4bf5-8881-cd26176afd39 Mon, 11 Mar 2024 07:28:53 -0400 Study reveals the impact of olfactory disorders on personal safety and emotional well-being

研究人员发现哺乳动物中的冷感蛋白密歇根大学的研究人员发现了使哺乳动物能够感知寒冷的蛋白质，填补了感觉生物学领域长期存在的知识空白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Researchers-identify-cold-sensing- Protein-in-mammals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Researchers-identify-cold-sensing- Protein-in-mammals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0fed538-34c4-4d81-bf4b-5792c83d4ca8 Mon, 11 Mar 2024 07:16:14 -0400 Researchers identify cold-sensing protein in mammals

加州总检察长推动禁止信用报告中医疗债务的法案加州总检察长罗布·邦塔周一宣布，他将大力支持立法，禁止医疗债务出现在消费者信用报告中，这是民主党领导的一项努力，旨在为受到医疗保健账单挤压的患者提供保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/California-Attorney-General-boosts-bill-banning-medical-debt-from-credit-reports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/California-Attorney-General-boosts-bill-banning-medical-debt-from-credit-reports.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0342ab9e-d123-4224-b041-53ae8643bf7d Mon, 11 Mar 2024 06:51:55 -0400 California Attorney General boosts bill banning medical debt from credit reports
为什么最能从帕克洛维德中受益的新冠患者仍然没有得到它福音派牧师埃迪·海厄特相信祈祷的治愈力量，但“也相信医疗方法”。因此，在预定的前列腺手术前一周的二月晚上，他在德克萨斯州格雷普韦恩家附近的急诊室检查了喉咙痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Why-covid-病人-who-could-most-benefit-from-paxlovid-still-arene28099t-getting-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Why-covid-病人-who-could-most-benefit-from-paxlovid-still-arene28099t-getting-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d23e0e0-5aba-46ac-86fa-e278bd0b731e Mon, 11 Mar 2024 06:50:15 -0400 Why covid patients who could most benefit from paxlovid still aren’t getting it
